text: This Chinese dialogue focuses upon the idea of “going cashless”.Using a phone to pay for items is a lot quicker than using cash (现金).小明：是的！无论你是去商店还是菜市场，差不多所有地方都可以用支付宝给钱。小明：In China it is rare to use cash.小红：Then how do people in China buy things?小明：They use a phone app called Alipay, it uses the internet to pay.小明：Yes! Whether you are in a shop or vegetable market, you can use Alipay in almost all places.小红：That’s really convenient! You only need to carry your phone outside.
